inclusion.criterion: recruited from hospitals in the capital region of Denmark.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patients will be referred to Hvidovre hospital for liver vein catheterisation, a diagnostic procedure included in the standard diagnostic programme for liver cirrhosis.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical signs of infection or biochemical signs of infection with leucocytes > 10x10^9/L and C-Reactive Protein (CRP)> 20 or positive urine culture
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Hep C cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
